1200 calorie meal plan day 1
content.introtext: <div class="box-hint">Breakfast<br />1 hard boiled egg<br />1 slice whole wheat toast<br />1 tsp. (5 mL) butter or margarine<br />&nbsp;<br />Snack<br />1/2 medium pear<br />1 piece part skim string cheese<br />&nbsp;<br />Lunch<br />&nbsp;1 serving In a Hurry Chili <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=753"><strong>(recipe)</strong></a> sprinkled with 2 Tbsp. (30 mL) shredded cheddar cheese<br />4 baby carrots<br />&nbsp;<br />Snack<br />1 small apple<br />1 Tbsp. (15 mL) natural peanut butter<br />&nbsp;<br />Dinner<br />&nbsp;1 serving Cranberry Turkey Burger <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=596"><strong>(recipe)</strong></a><br />1 serving Green Bean Stir Fry <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=659"><strong>(recipe)<br /></strong></a>&nbsp;<br />Snack<br />3/4 cup (170 mL) nonfat light yogurt<br />&nbsp;<br />Daily Totals: 1170 calories, 75 g protein, 45 g fat (16 g saturated), 375 mg cholesterol, 121 g carbohydrate, 22 g fibre, 61 g sugar, 1280 mg sodium</div>

content.title: 1200 calorie meal plan day 1
1200 calorie meal plan day 1
1200 calorie meal plan day 1
content.introtext: <div class="box-warning">Breakfast<br />1 serving Berrycotta Pancakes <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=832">(recipe) </a>with 1 tbsp (15 mL) sugar free syrup<br /><br />Snack<br />2 plums<br /><br />Lunch<br />1 soy burger topped with 1 slice low fat cheddar cheese on 1 sandwich thin bun with lettuce, tomato, onion slice, 2 tsp (10 mL) light mayo<br />1 cup (250 mL) diced cantaloupe<br /><br />Snack<br />1 cup (250 mL) snap peas<br />2 tbsp (30 mL) hummus<br /><br />Dinner<br />1 serving Poblano Scallops <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=766">(recipe)</a><br />¼ cup (50 mL) whole wheat couscous cooked in low sodium vegetable broth<br />1 cup (250 mL) raw zucchini slices sautéed in ½ tsp (2 mL) olive oil<br /><br />Snack<br />Berry parfait yogurt*: layer ¼ cup (50 mL) nonfat plain Greek yogurt, ¼ cup (50 mL) blackberries, ¼ cup (50 mL) nonfat plain Greek yogurt, ¼ cup (50 mL) sliced strawberries topped with 1 tbsp (15 mL) slivered almonds<br />*Flavour yogurt with sugar substitute and vanilla or almond extract.<br /><br /><br />Daily Totals: 1190 calories, 73g protein, 35g fat (9g saturated), 85mg cholesterol, 160g carbohydrate, 27g fibre, 54g sugar, 1870mg sodium</div>

1800 calorie meal plan day 3
content.introtext:
<div class="box-info">
Breakfast<br />1 whole wheat toaster waffle with 1 tbsp (15 mL) peanut butter and 1 tbsp (15 mL) no sugar added fruit preserves<br />½ medium grapefruit sprinkled with sugar substitute<br /><br />Snack<br />¾ cup (175 mL) lowfat cottage cheese mixed with ½ cup (125 mL) unsweetened applesauce and sprinkled with 1 tbsp (15 mL) Bran Buds and cinnamon<br /><br />Lunch<br />Egg salad sandwich made with 2 hardboiled eggs, 1 tbsp (15 mL) light mayonnaise, ¼ tsp (1 ml) mustard on 2 slices whole bread<br />1 medium tomato, sliced<br /><br />Snack<br />1 fresh mango<br /><br />Dinner<br />1½ serving Brunswick Stew <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=656">(recipe)</a><br />25 oyster crackers<br /><br />Snack<br />1 serving Spicy Almonds <a href="index.php?option=com_recipe&amp;Itemid=101&amp;r=1112">(recipe)</a><br /><br />Daily Totals: 1770 calories, 104g protein, 67g fat (11g saturated), 505mg cholesterol, 201g carbohydrate,&nbsp; 29g fibre, 58g sugar, 2270mg sodium</div>
